awards.text: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 3 wins & 3 nominations.

fullplot: 19th-century Boston woman dedicated to the suffrage movement, meets a faith healer's daughter, a Mississippi lawyer also has eyes for the young woman.
plot: A Boston feminist and a conservative Southern lawyer contend for the heart and mind of a beautiful and bright girl unsure of her future.
title: The Bostonians
